action_output_list: To change the language in Retro Music, I need to open the app first.{"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Retro Music"}
To change the language, I need to find the settings menu. The "More options" button might lead to settings.{"action_type": "click", "index": 14}
To change the language, I need to go to the settings menu.{"action_type": "click", "index": 24}
To find the language settings, I need to scroll down the screen to see if there is a language option.{"action_type": "scroll", "direction": "down", "index": 8}
